func.title: BlastObjects

param.name: container
param.desc: Container of the objects to be blasted.

param.name: caused_by
param.desc: Number of the player who has caused the damage. If not specified, the the controller of the calling object is considered to have caused the damage in local calls.

param.name: damage_level
param.desc: If specified, then this value overrides the damage that is caused to objects.

func.desc: Applies explosion damage to all objects at the specified position. x and y are always global coordinates. If a container is specified, damage is only applied to objects contained in that container. Explosion damage can cause incineration or fling away living objects.

example.text: The calling object causes explosion damage of level 60 to its contents.
